attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do more to show the merits of less human beings on the earth to...........
1) Slow down ravages of climate change caused by destruction of the rain forests.  2) Give more land back to wild animals.  3) Tax heavily families with more than 2 children.  Show that they are just too selfish in wanting to procreate when there are already children wanting fostere homes and the like.  Give massive tax breaks to fostering parents.
